amendment.description: To place the Coalition Provisional Authority in Iraq under the direct authority and foreign policy guidance of the Secretary of State.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 374.

Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S12339-12346; text: CR S12339) To place the Coalition Provisional Authority in Iraq under the direct authority and foreign policy guidance of the Secretary of State.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 374.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Leahy.
